sources.title: Old Mother Riley Joins Up
sources.description: Title: Old Mother Riley Joins Up Summary: Directed by: Maclean Rogers Actors: Arthur Lucan, Kitty McShane, Glen Alyn Production Company: British National Films Release Date: 26 February 1940 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: Old Mother Riley, with the help of her daughter Kitty and Kitty's boyfriend Lieutenant Travers, thwarts a plan by enemy agents to steal important secret documents.
metadata.Writer: Kathleen Butler, Jack Marks, Maisie Sharman
metadata.Actors: Arthur Lucan, Kitty McShane, Glen Alyn
